code: import{cookies}from'utils/cookies';import{COOKIES_TYPE}from"global";export var LOGIN_SUCCESS='LOGIN_SUCCESS';export var LOGIN_FAILED='LOGIN_FAILED';export function CurrentUserInfo(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:cookies.get(COOKIES_TYPE.AUTH_TOKEN)!=null&&cookies.get(COOKIES_TYPE.AUTH_TOKEN).User!=null?cookies.get(COOKIES_TYPE.AUTH_TOKEN).User:null;var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case LOGIN_SUCCESS:return action.payload;case LOGIN_FAILED:return null;default:return state;}}
